mapper.update:
update com_check_resume
resume_id = #{resumeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
com_check_resume_status = #{comCheckResumeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update com_check_resume set resume_id = #{resumeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, com_check_resume_status = #{comCheckResumeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, com_check_resume_time = #{comCheckResumeTime,jdbcType=DATE}, com_check_resume_prepare_a = #{comCheckResumePrepareA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_check_resume_prepare_b = #{comCheckResumePrepareB,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where com_check_resume_id = #{comCheckResumeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT stu_name As stuName,stu_gender As stuGender,stu_degree As stuDegree,stu_addr_city As stuAddrCity, com_release_job_name AS comJobName,com_name As comName,com_release_job_requir As comJobRequir, stu_tel As stuTel,stu_email As stuEmail,deliver_resume_time As deliverResumeTime,d1.resume_id As resumeId from student As s1,com_release_job As c1,com_message As c2,deliver_resume As d1 ,resume As r1 where s1.stu_id = d1.stu_id and d1.com_id = c2.com_id and c2.com_id = c1.com_id and d1.deliver_prepare_a = c1.com_release_job_id and d1.resumeId = r1.resumeId and d1.com_id = ${comId}
